root.description: OverviewBrain Spa is an educational mini-game collection developed and published by Ubisoft for the PC platform.System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000 / XP / VistaProcessor: 500 MHz Pentium III or AMD K6 III or betterMemory: 128 MB (256 MB required when using Vista or XP)Video: 32 MB DirectX 7-compliant video card (64 MB recommended)Sound: DirectX 7-compliant sound cardDirectX: DirectX 7 or higherDisk Space: 70 MB free
